project_descr: Support to promote national unity and reconciliation efforts through targeted technical assistance to ONUR and the Northern and Eastern Provincial administration.

outputs.output_descr:
Northern Provincial  institutions capacitated to provide improved and inclusive service delivery and Provincial Development Plans formulated for delivering resilient development results in an integrated and coordinated manner.

.

Eastern Provincial  institutions capacitated to provide improved and inclusive service delivery and Provincial Development Plans formulated for delivering resilient development results in an integrated and coordinated manner.
